## CustomerQuery type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CustomerQuery = {
    customer?: Maybe<{
        is_subscribed?: Maybe<boolean>;
        allow_remote_shopping_assistance: boolean;
        date_of_birth?: Maybe<string>;
        default_billing?: Maybe<string>;
        default_shipping?: Maybe<string>;
        email?: Maybe<string>;
        firstname?: Maybe<string>;
        lastname?: Maybe<string>;
        middlename?: Maybe<string>;
        prefix?: Maybe<string>;
        suffix?: Maybe<string>;
        taxvat?: Maybe<string>;
        addresses?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<{
            city?: Maybe<string>;
            country_code?: Maybe<CountryCodeEnum>;
            default_billing?: Maybe<boolean>;
            default_shipping?: Maybe<boolean>;
            firstname?: Maybe<string>;
            id?: Maybe<number>;
            lastname?: Maybe<string>;
            postcode?: Maybe<string>;
            prefix?: Maybe<string>;
            street?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<string>>>;
            suffix?: Maybe<string>;
            telephone?: Maybe<string>;
            extension_attributes?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<{
                attribute_code?: Maybe<string>;
                value?: Maybe<string>;
            }>>>;
            region?: Maybe<{
                region_code?: Maybe<string>;
                region_id?: Maybe<number>;
                region?: Maybe<string>;
            }>;
        }>>>;
    }>;
};
```
